events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in our company.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further consideration.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the hiring process and answer any queries you might have.
We completed the initial screening of your qualifications and experience and found them to be promising for the role.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions; we appreciate your enthusiasm and clear communication.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 9:00 AM. Please prepare to discuss your project experience and coding skills.
